p: Exploratory analysis was performed first to establish the most adequate statistical test. Significant differences between the controls and test substance in the kinetic, biofilm, and PBMC cytotoxicity assays were assessed with the Kruskal-Wallis test followed by Dunn's post hoc test ( Î± = 0.05) using GraphPad Prism version 7.0 (San Diego, CA, USA).
